Guild Beatdown.name: Guild Beatdown
Guild Beatdown.flavor: You strike your foe, cuing your friend to take a cheap shot.
Guild Beatdown.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Guild Beatdown.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and one ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action. If the ally hits and has combat advantage, that attack deals 1d6 extra damage.

Shifty Direction.name: Shifty Direction
Shifty Direction.flavor: With cutthroat timing, you help your ally carefully maneuver.
Shifty Direction.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you is missed by an attack
Shifty Direction.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Shifty Direction.effect: The target can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

Biting Repositioning.name: Biting Repositioning
Biting Repositioning.flavor: Your attack creates just the right opportunity for you and your crew to back offâ€”or to change the flow of the battle.
Biting Repositioning.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Biting Repositioning.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you and each ally within 5 squares of you can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.
Biting Repositioning.onMiss: Half damage, and you or one ally within 5 squares of you can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.
